subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A.'s Infractions Committee announced that it would apply no additional penalties to the St. John's basketball program in the wake of a former staff member's admission that he gave cash payments to a player.
snippet: The N.C.A.A.'s Infractions Committee announced that it would apply no additional penalties to the St. John's basketball program in the wake of a former staff member's admission that he gave cash payments to a player.
